content: weaving willow is a triangular shawl that you can wrap around your neck or drape over your shoulders this shawl alternates thick row with lacy bands in a pattern the front-post and back-post stitches create a texture like a woven willow basket the shawl can be made bigger or smaller depending on how often you repeat the row depending on the repetition you need more or less yarn any gradient fingering yarn should work for this or any fingering weight yarn if you prefer a more uniform color stitches used in this pattern chain double_crochet half_double_crochet front post double_crochet back post double_crochet puff -------------------------- i would love to see pictures of your project if you use this pattern - oktarine
